name: nsrdude
text: Does Ray not appreciate how much 50 grams of coke would cost?

name: straw
text: From the ensuing conversation, I'm pretty sure he does

name: deimosrising
text: On the other hand, all the cool kids are doing it

name: william
text: How did we get from having AIDS to organ theft?  These are not related.  Also who would steal kidneys full of Hi-Five?

name: farqussus
text: You are operating under the misapprehension that people who steal kidneys are concerned about their viral content.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Silly Ray, you can't sell kidneys on eBay!

name: ssddr
text: You could on ebay platinum reserve.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Touche .

text: That van is frikkin' awesome.

name: philosophe
text: What is Hi-Five? A rhythm and blues quartet?

name: adhesion
text: Alt text: "High-Five = HIV"

name: philosophe
text: Ahhhhhhh....

name: charchar
text: HIV= H-Four.

name: snowman
text: Huh?

name: charchar
text: In Roman numerals IV makes four.

name: snowman
text:
Yeah, but it wasn't H-five, it was HI-five. The "I" is not part of the five.

Okay, this is a dumb argument.

name: charchar
text: I know.  I was trying to be clever.  We cool, snowman?

name: snowman
text: Yep.  Tote.

name: donnatron
text: That argument took up 5 seconds of my life that I will never get back. This comment took up approximately 10 more...

name: farqussus
text: Also, a children's entertainment quintet. Of equal value to the world as HIV.

name: farqussus
text: Who lamed me? Who defends Hi-Five

name: rowboat
text: Maybe they were defending their HIV.

name: stuart
text: If you take sizes into account, I'm really suspicious of the idea of fifty grams of anything fitting in that bag.

name: farqussus
text: Coke is being cut with anti-matter to increase profit margins.

text: 5 just for the fact that this reference is used.

text: todd is terrible

text: The story of my life (hopefully).

wait you think Todd knows good math?

name: ndcaesar
text: I'm mystified that the other 39 commentors have failed to acknowledge the subtle lean performed by Todd in the last panel. It adds so much

text: Man, I need to start using Hi-Five as a euphemism for the HIV.

text: I already have!

text: that's the course.  it's all fun and games, then comes the HIV, then your organs go missing so that you can't even buy 'em back.  this world, man...
